#include <iostream>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>


#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define RFOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define big long long
#define vb vector<big> 
#define pb push_back

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
    big q,i,j,t,te,n,k,c;
    vb v;
    cin>>t;
    while(t-->0){
        c=0;
        cin>>n>>k;
        FOR(i,1,n){
            cin>>te;
            if(te>=k)
                c++;
        }
        cout<<c<<endl;
    }
	return 0;
}
